name: Grief (itch) (Sun Blossom Studios)
description:
Grief is a first-person, narrative-driven Platformer. This is a game about loss, and the way a person may cope with losing someone or something that means so much to them. A game that challenges reflexes, and the emotions that we must deal with throughout our lives.

Updates will be coming out as bugs are found:

- Files were updated 6/16/15 to fix a bug that prevented you from proceeding past the second chapter.
